name: Fire Keeper (Luminoso)
description:
Fire Keeper is a game made for the GMTK game jam 2020. The theme for the jam is Out of Control.

Description:

In Fire Keeper, you play as a robot defending  a bonfire from the out of control seekers by feeding the fire various things you can pick up from the ground. Fire Keeper is an endless game, your goal is to get the high score, as there is no win condition. There are 2 ways to lose:

1:the fire runs out(indicated by the fire bar).

2: you run out of health (indicated by the health bar)

The fire bar slowly goes down over time.

The health bar goes down by a quarter whenever the seeker touches you.

 Enjoy! Feedback is always appreciated

Controls:

WASD/Arrows to move

Spacebar to pickup and drop objects

Escape to pause

How to Play:

pickup the sticks and rope and drop into fire. Avoid tank with flashing red light.
